history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Basset directions
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER bus
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to hughes funeral home inc. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Hello.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER Walnut Street
TTS Okay, leaving from walnut st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 0 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to Highland avenue at Walnut St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 71B to Liberty avenue at 6th St. It will depart at 11:11pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 2 mins to Liberty avenue at 7th St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 1 to 31st St Bridge Ramp at 31st St Bridge. It will depart at 11:45pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
